question:
Each civil engineer in the firm acted as ________ the others: no one submitted a construction project proposal if another expressed concerns about either the feasibility of the project or the cost estimates.
Two Answers
A. a go between for
B.  a reviewer for
C.  an estimator for
D.  a negotiator for
E.  a hindrance to
F. an overseer to
Show
Hide
